New Delhi, the 8th October, 2024
G.S.R.....(E).- In exercise of the powers conferred by sub-section (1), sub-sections (3) and (4) of section
9, sub-section (1) of section 11, sub-section (5) of section 15, sub-section (1) of section 16 and section

hereby makes the following further amendments in the notification of the Government of India, in the
Ministry of Finance (Department of Revenue), number 11/2017-Central Tax (Rate), dated the 28th June,
2017, published in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II, section 3, sub-section (i), vide number
G.S.R. 690(E), dated the 28th June, 2017, namely:-
